title: Home Page
header: Welcome to the website of Faith Alive Fellowship!
meta_content: Welcome to Faith Alive Fellowship, we're happy you are here and would love to hear from you. In the meantime, please feel free to check out our site, we love you!
content:
We are currently in the first phase of updating and making our website more mobile and tablet friendly. Most if not all images have been removed, but will be making a return soon. Please stay tuned here as well as social media for updates and enjoy the website.

Make a Donation

If it's on your heart to make a donation, this link will take you to a secured PayPal donation page.
